name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience crafting high-performance applications, specializing in **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Python**, and **Django**. Demonstrated expertise in building robust web APIs and distributed systems, with a profound understanding of **agile** methodologies. Adept at problem-solving and critical-thinking, ensuring attention to detail in every aspect of development.
Skilled in leveraging modern frameworks and libraries, including **Ruby on Rails**, to enhance application functionality. Proven ability to integrate observability practices within development processes and deliver compliance-driven solutions that meet industry standards. Committed to driving innovation while supporting business goals through technology.

Created and managed CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, achieving faster deployment cycles with a 50% reduction in time.
Developed complex user interfaces with an emphasis on reusability and scalability, achieving a modular design pattern across applications.
